member.name: T:HealthGraphAPI.Constants
member.summary: Internal-use constatns

member.name: F:HealthGraphAPI.Constants.URL_AUTHORIZATION
member.summary: This is the URL to which the application should redirect the user in order to authorize access to his/her Runkeeper account.

member.name: F:HealthGraphAPI.Constants.URL_TOKEN
member.summary: This is the URL at which the application can convert an authorization code to an access token.

member.name: F:HealthGraphAPI.Constants.URL_DEAUTHORIZATION
member.summary: This is the URL at which the application can disconnect itself from the user's account.

member.name: F:HealthGraphAPI.Constants.URL_BASE_API
member.summary: This is the base URL to access all Health Graph API resources.

member.name: F:HealthGraphAPI.Constants.PATH_USER
member.summary: This is the path for the user resource.

member.name: F:HealthGraphAPI.Constants.QUERY_CLIENT_ID
member.summary: URL QueryString key to pass the registered application unique identifier.

member.name: F:HealthGraphAPI.Constants.QUERY_CLIENT_SECRET
member.summary: URL QueryString key to pass the registered application secret.

member.name: F:HealthGraphAPI.Constants.QUERY_REDIRECT_URI
member.summary: URL QueryString key to pass the page where should redirect the user after accepting or denying the access request.

member.name: F:HealthGraphAPI.Constants.QUERY_RESPONSE_TYPE
member.summary: URL QueryString key to pass the expected response type.

member.name: F:HealthGraphAPI.Constants.QUERY_STATE
member.summary: URL QueryString key to pass the meaningful state for the application.

member.name: F:HealthGraphAPI.Constants.QUERY_CODE
member.summary: URL QueryString key which will contain a one-time authorization code needed to obtain an access token.

member.name: F:HealthGraphAPI.Constants.QUERY_GRANT_TYPE
member.summary: URL QueryString key which will contain the type of access granted.

member.name: F:HealthGraphAPI.Constants.RESPONSE_TYPE_CODE
member.summary: The QueryString value to obtain the one-time authorization code needed to obtain an access token.

member.name: F:HealthGraphAPI.Constants.GRANT_TYPE_AUTHORIZATION_CODE
member.summary: The QueryString value to obtain an access token.
